text: LOS ANGELES ( CBSLA ) — Mariah Carey has joined a growing number of Los Angeles celebrities who have had their Los Angeles - area homes burglarized. The singer ’ s Los Angeles mansion was hit by burglars, who got away with $ 50, 000 in purses and sunglasses, but no jewelry, according to TMZ. Los Angeles police would not confirm a burglary investigation involving Carey, but the TMZ report says her home was broken into at about 3 a. m. Thursday while she was in New York City. No one else was home at the time. The burglars reportedly got into the home through a window or door on an upper floor. A ladder was apparently found in the backyard. Dozens of celebrities have been hit by burglars this year
